label: 玄蕃寮
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Bureau (ryō) under the Ministry of Civil Administration (Jibushō). In charge of lists of Buddhist priests (sō), nuns (ama), temples, Buddhist ceremonies; also aliens, foreign envoys, entertainment of ambassadors. [治部省、僧、尼]
